author: Dan
content: whenever environmentalists talk about whales , they never talk about the right of Indian’s and Eskimo tribes right to hunt and kill whales? Although they claim that right, they use 1800 gun technology to kill them now !

author: Phil
content:
I hate humans and what we do to animals..
But on the other hand I love beef and spring lamb.

author: Phil
content:
The poor things were scared, not knowing what was happening to them.
And that pool they were released in, isn’t large enough!
